property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)} ■ Whenever you cast a spell, this creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn. TWINPACT ■ One of your creatures gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn. (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ One of your creatures gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn. (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-11 Super GR Start Deck: Cap's WAVE Gacha Paradise

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 2 (Water): When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 or more card in your mana zone and one or more of them is water civilization, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-11 Super GR Start Deck: Cap's WAVE Gacha Paradise

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If there are 3 or more spells in your graveyard, this creature gets +4000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.value: DMSD-11 Super GR Start Deck: Cap's WAVE Gacha Paradise

property.name: Rules
